question: 臥す
sourceAnswer:
<read>ふす</read>:: to: lie-down-(in-bed)
<read>がす</read>:: to: lie-down-(in-bed)/take-to-one's-bed
<read>こやす</read>:<tag><ja>臥やす</ja></tag>:: to: to-lie-down
